refnamediv.refpurpose: bind an existing texture object to the specified texture unit

listitem.para: Specifies the texture unit, to which the texture object should be bound to.
Specifies the name of a texture.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: glBindTextureUnit binds an existing texture object to the texture unit numbered unit.

texture must be zero or the name of an existing texture object. When texture is the name of an existing texture object, that object is bound to the target, in the corresponding texture unit, that was specified when the object was created. When texture is zero, each of the targets enumerated at the beginning of this section is reset to its default texture for the corresponding texture image unit.

refsect1.title: Associated Gets
refsect1.para: glGet with argument GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_1D, GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_2D, GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_3D, GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_1D_ARRAY, GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_2D_ARRAY, GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_RECTANGLE, GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_BUFFER, GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_CUBE_MAP, GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_CUBE_MAP_ARRAY, GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_2D_MULTISAMPLE or GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_2D_MULTISAMPLE_ARRAY.

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para: GL_INVALID_OPERATION error is generated if texture is not zero or the name of an existing texture object.
